item.title: Excess Litter, 27th June
item.description:
Cinema Public Car Park, 22 Broadway, Bexleyheath, DA6 7RB: Please could you ask your street cleaning contractor - Countrystyle to remove the excess litter from all floor levels of this car park as seen in the attached pictures.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Rubbish, 27th June
item.description:
Cinema Public Car Park, 22 Broadway, Bexleyheath, DA6 7RB: Please could you ask your street cleaning contractor - Countrystyle to stop dumping their blue waste sacks outside of this car park - as seen in the attached pictures. Quite frankly, it looks a mess, it attracts foxes and other vermin, encourages fly-tipping and is not a temporary dumping ground. Please remove these items and ask the contractor to stop leaving their rubbish here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent – enforce immediately! commercial waste dumped on bayford street!, 26th June
item.description:
161 Mare Street is brazenly and repeatedly dumping commercial waste on a daily basis, with no regard for public hygiene, residents, or the law. The councils failure to act is shameful. This street is turning into a dumping ground. SORT IT HACKNEY COUNCIL!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crystal Palace Park Road SE26 / High Street. Betwe, 26th June
item.description:
Crystal Palace Park Road SE26 / High Street. Between the junctions of Thicket Road (Crystal Palace Park Rd) and Anerley Park (High St) is a brick over bridge. The support of this bridge (esp check end of) on the Thicket Rd / Anerley Park side tagged – Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/ maps/ @51.418628,-0.0611752,3a,17.7y,153.77h,87.55t/ data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1stNbtN-YRiVSK5SYNrkxo5Q!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D2.4515105685847516%26panoid%3DtNbtN-YRiVSK5SYNrkxo5Q%26yaw%3D153.77045512844734!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDQxNC4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNjM5SAFQAw%3D%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thurlow Hill SE21 outside house number 25 (a fe, 26th June
item.description:
Thurlow Hill SE21 outside house number 25 (a few yards from Lovelace Rd junction) Lambeth yellow plastic grit bin tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/place/25+Thurlow+Hill,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8JW/@51.4403206,-0.1004793,3a,75y,261.42h,91.22t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sHO9mfzcvxkB0g8mN1YA5rw!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D-1.220871384674453%26panoid%3DHO9mfzcvxkB0g8mN1YA5rw%26yaw%3D261.4229458338087!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x48760405ebddb5ed:0xbdf4c03f387c7fe8!8m2!3d51.4403332!4d-0.1006629!16s%2Fg%2F11c1_21yc4?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYyMy4yIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

item.title: Infront of the recycle bins, 26th June
item.description:
A household threw a wardrobe from Leff house yesterday then left it Infront of the recycle bins, there resident CCTV cameras covering this area, easily to identify who did it if the council chose to do so and actually enforce the warnings that are posted up.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Winchester Avenue, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Young tree in Croydon road park suffering, 26th June
item.description:
Young tree planted in park isn't being watered. This goes for many of the Young trees in this area recently planted, and suffering. This is a sad problem when bromley council keeps going on about how proud they are of this initiative. Maybe water trucks should be patrolling and watering and monitoring them in this extreme weather. People are trying but we can't do them all. I am trying to water 3 trees in my street alone

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet
